Set up cache.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
options(replace.assign=TRUE)
opts_chunk$set(cache=TRUE, fig.width=6, fig.height=4)
```

This is a plot from **ggplot2**:

```{r ggplot}
library(ggplot2)
p=qplot(carat, price, data = diamonds)
p
```

Here are two plots:

```{r two-plots}
p + facet_grid(~color)
p + geom_point(aes(color = cut))
```

Here are many plots:

```{r animation, fig.show='animate', interval=.2, fig.height=6}
library(animation)
demo('Mandelbrot', package='animation', echo = FALSE)
```
